title: CiviContracts — Policy‑as‑Code with Civic Tests
summary: Encode policies as testable contracts with unit/impact tests, datasets, and red‑team scenarios; publish green/red dashboards and machine‑readable change logs.
rationale: Turning prose into executable checks catches regressions, democratizes review, and aligns agencies on expected outcomes.
impact: Fewer unintended consequences; faster compliance rollouts; easier handoffs during transitions.
